sentence.Network_en: Some shops are bowing to consumer pressure and stocking organically grown vegetables.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些商店迫于顾客的压力，开始供应有机蔬菜。

sentence.Network_en: I have only a bowing [ nodding ] acquaintance with him.
sentence.Network_cn: 我和他只有点头之 交.

sentence.Network_en: " Oh, we'll be right back, Miss Madenda,'said one of the chaps, bowing.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 哦, 我们马上就回来, 麦登达小姐, "小伙子中的一个鞠了鞠躬说.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 如果硅片已经经过前面的多道工序加工,硅片内会积累内应力,这种内应力会加剧硅片的翘曲(bowing)。这就会使硅片各点与掩模的间隙不均匀,因而使照射到胶表面的光强分布.
